page.title: 04INDUSTRY AND EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Raunds has many shops, the oldest of which is Frost's hardware shop.The newest shop is Step-Ahead which employs three people.The major retail employer is Gateway, which employs mainly young people.Most of the banks' employees have Maths and English O- levels. Raunds has a small market which contains only eight stalls. These sell:-cakes,shoes,cards,groceries,Bits and Bobs and sweets. {Important Trades The main employers in Raunds are:- the Tannery,Coggins and Smith's Containers which produces over a million containers a day.Smith's which employs 350 people on two sites, is only 15 years old.
